Society Galaxy clusters yield new evidence for standard model of cosmologyDetailed measurements of the X-ray emissions from galaxy clusters helped Stanford and SLAC scientists test the prevailing theory of the structure and evolution of the universe.Read more about	Galaxy clusters yield new evidence for standard model of cosmology The state of AI in 14 chartsA scaling up of large language models, the environmental costs of training them, increasing ethical scrutiny, and more are visualized in this snapshot of the 2023 AI Index.Read more about	The state of AI in 14 charts Virtual touchThree years into the Zoom era, roboticist Allison Okamura thinks it’s time for technology that reconnects us with the physical world.Read more about	Virtual touchVisionFacilitate interdisciplinary research and maintain public trust in a culture of integrity that celebrates the diversity of ideas and people.MissionTo provide guidance and support to facilitate, nurture, and safeguard a thriving research ecosystem.AboutLearn more about the role of the VPDoR in supporting Stanford’s research ecosystem, and its units, institutes, centers, and research labs.More on our vision, mission, & about usTopicsIn-depth explanations of core concepts with links to related policies, resources and contacts.View TopicsPolicies & ResourcesUniversity-wide policy manuals, how tos,
